>In the past decade, there has been a dramatic increase in the number of American student-loan borrowers leaving college with high debt and low earnings. The resulting unsustainable debt burdens impose substantial costs on students and on federal taxpayers. Much of the growth in the levels of student loans has been linked to the rise of for-profit colleges and other institutions with weak educational outcomes. ~Adam Looney, Brookings.edu
